title: People considering artificial devices as pals
description: One in five Brits now see artificial intelligence (AI) assistants like Alexa and Siri as genuine friends, with many even turning to them for advice and love notes, a new study reveals.
content:
Artificial intelligence (AI) gadgets such as Alexa, Siri and ChatGPT are being treated as genuine friends by a growing number of Brits.
A study by electronics retailer Currys revealed that one in five people believe they have struck up a real friends... [873 chars]

title: Most adults couldn't differentiate between authentic, AI phishing emails
description: In a recent global survey, most people couldn’t differentiate between a phishing message written by artificial intelligence and an authentic, human-written email.
content:
In a recent global survey, most people couldn’t differentiate between a phishing message written by artificial intelligence (AI) and an authentic, human-written email.
The survey of 18,000 employed adults from around the globe tested them on their aw... [5661 chars]

title: U.S. government shutdown leads to lack of jobs data
description: The interruption in the data has occurred at a particularly uncertain time, when policymakers at the Federal Reserve and Wall Street investors would need more data on the economy, rather than less. Hiring has ground nearly to a halt, threatening to drag down the broader economy. Yet at the same time, consumers — particularly higher-income earners — are still spending and some businesses are ramping up investments in data centres developing artificial intelligence models. Whether that is enough to revive hiring remains to be seen.
content: WASHINGTON — From Wall Street trading floors to the Federal Reserve to economists sipping coffee in their home offices, the first Friday morning of the month typically brings a quiet hush around 8:30 a.m. eastern as everyone awaits the U.S. Labor Dep... [5350 chars]

title: 7 Ways Technology Is Transforming the Auto Insurance Industry
description: The auto insurance business has always conformed to the driving trends and customer demands, but the rate of change today is unparalleled. title: Tech Stock Rally Loses Steam in Afternoon Trading: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- The rally in tech stocks took a breather as equities cooled after touching record highs amid another round of big-ticket artificial intelligence deals and partnerships. Treasuries and the dollar slumped as a US government shutdown extended for a third day.

title: AI bubble warnings grow louder: Investors sound alarm on sky
description: The AI boom has dominated headlines for months, but a growing chorus of influential voices is starting to sound uneasy. What began as a caution from OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in August has turned into a broader debate about whether the frenzy around artificial intelligence is starting to look like the late-1990s dot-com bubble.
